CustomField.formula: text(Deal__r.LTV__c*100) + '% (' + IF( MIN(Deal__r.LTV__c*BPO_Appraisal_Value_Total__c, Deal__r.LTV__c*Purchase_Price_Total__c) < 0, "(", "") & "$" & IF(ABS(MIN(Deal__r.LTV__c*BPO_Appraisal_Value_Total__c, Deal__r.LTV__c*Purchase_Price_Total__c)) >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(ABS(MIN(Deal__r.LTV__c*BPO_Appraisal_Value_Total__c, Deal__r.LTV__c*Purchase_Price_Total__c)) / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF(ABS(MIN(Deal__r.LTV__c*BPO_Appraisal_Value_Total__c, Deal__r.LTV__c*Purchase_Price_Total__c)) >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(ABS(MIN(Deal__r.LTV__c*BPO_Appraisal_Value_Total__c, Deal__r.LTV__c*Purchase_Price_Total__c)) / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(ABS(MIN(Deal__r.LTV__c*BPO_Appraisal_Value_Total__c, Deal__r.LTV__c*Purchase_Price_Total__c)))), 3) & "." & IF(MOD(ABS(MIN(Deal__r.LTV__c*BPO_Appraisal_Value_Total__c, Deal__r.LTV__c*Purchase_Price_Total__c)) , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(ABS(MIN(Deal__r.LTV__c*BPO_Appraisal_Value_Total__c, Deal__r.LTV__c*Purchase_Price_Total__c)) , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(ABS(MIN(Deal__r.LTV__c*BPO_Appraisal_Value_Total__c, Deal__r.LTV__c*Purchase_Price_Total__c)) , 1), 2) * 100, 99))) & IF(MIN(Deal__r.LTV__c*BPO_Appraisal_Value_Total__c, Deal__r.LTV__c*Purchase_Price_Total__c) < 0, ")", "") + ')'
CustomField.label: Deal Max Initial LTV/LTC
